author: olegk
msg: [HTTPCORE-11] Provide generic server and client connection primitives that can work with arbitrary HTTP data receivers and transmitters
(1) HttpRequestExecutor no longer attempts to re-open the connection in case of an I/O failure
(2) No more request retry code in HttpRequestExecutor

author: cutting
msg: HADOOP-424.  Fix MapReduce so that jobs with zero splits do not fail.  Contributed by Frédéric Bertin.
